item.title: Italian citizenship referendum void after low turnout
item.description: Only about 30% of Italians cast a vote - well below the 50% threshold needed to make a poll binding.

item.title: Protest hits Kenya after shock death of man held by police
item.description: Albert Ojwang was detained after the deputy police chief accused him of tarnishing his name on social media.

item.title: Prisoner swap between Russia and Ukraine under way
item.description: The prisoners of war being exchanged are wounded or under 25 years old, President Zelensky says.

item.title: Australian journalist hit by 'rubber bullet' while reporting from LA
item.description: Channel Nine's Lauren Tomasi appeared to be hit by a non-lethal round as she reported from the scene.

item.title: South Korea cements cultural status with six Tonys for Maybe Happy Ending
item.description: The beloved musical won six awards at the top US honours for threatre.
